tika.dc.description: Want to know how to use an electronic component? This third book of a three-volume set includes key information on electronics parts for your projects—complete with photographs, schematics, and diagrams. You'll learn what each one does, how it works, why it's useful, and what variants exist. Volume 3 covers components for sensing the physical world, including light, sound, heat, motion, ambient, and electrical sensors.
